name: Ice Jewel Extra Mania
description:
Ice Jewel Extra Mania is totally FREE, a wonderful game, it has a simple gameplay, yet addictive, interesting and suited everyone
There are many crazy puzzles that are created from beautiful sapphire gems. It's an addictive game for everyone.Game play is absolutely simple to suit everyone's taste. Just swap and match 3 or more same jewels to eliminate them, try to make more combos.
How to Play:
- Swap the jewels to match 3 in a line to remove them
- Arcade Mode: Reach a specific goal to solve the puzzle
- Time Mode: Match as fast as you can to level up
